name: part_008
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2025】生誕 3D LIVE 睡夢 - suimu -【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [eV59GTk0J3s]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Shirogane Noel, Houshou Marine, and Usada Pekora performing 'Fanfare' on stage.
Shirogane Noel performing her solo song 'Très Bien Night' on stage.

subtitles.original: 世界の向こうに 届けよう
subtitles.english: Let's send it beyond the world.

subtitles.original: 終わることのない この胸の衝動は
subtitles.english: This impulse in my heart that never ends...

subtitles.original: どうしたって どうしても ぼくを呼んでいた
subtitles.english: No matter what, no matter what, it was calling me.

subtitles.original: だから
subtitles.english: So...

subtitles.original: その先へと 走り続ける
subtitles.english: I'll keep running towards what lies ahead.

subtitles.original: 次へ 次へ
subtitles.english: To the next stage, to the next!

subtitles.original: 妄想だった？ 中途半端な
subtitles.english: Was it a delusion? Half-hearted...

subtitles.original: 概念さ 抱えて立ち尽くしていた
subtitles.english: ...concepts, I stood there holding onto them.

subtitles.original: 通り雨はプレリュード
subtitles.english: The passing rain is a prelude.

subtitles.original: 何千回も 何万回も 挑み続けたきみへ
subtitles.english: To you who continued to challenge thousands, tens of thousands of times.

subtitles.original: ねぇ聴かせてよ 夢は叶うんだって
subtitles.english: Hey, tell me that dreams do come true.

subtitles.original: 「諦め=完敗」ならば
subtitles.english: If 'giving up equals total defeat'...

subtitles.original: 絶対にないよ
subtitles.english: ...then there's absolutely no way.

subtitles.original: だれに邪魔されようと
subtitles.english: No matter who gets in my way.

subtitles.original: ためらわないで
subtitles.english: Don't hesitate.

subtitles.original: 託された情熱を 落とさずに繋いでく
subtitles.english: Connecting the entrusted passion without dropping it.

subtitles.original: そう最後まで
subtitles.english: Yes, until the very end.

subtitles.original: フラッグに誓い 雄々しくはためいて
subtitles.english: Vow to the flag, fluttering bravely.

subtitles.original: 鳴り止まないファンファーレ
subtitles.english: The fanfare that won't stop ringing.

subtitles.original: いつも心に 流れていた
subtitles.english: It was always flowing in my heart.

subtitles.original: 遠い未来へ 祈るよう
subtitles.english: Like praying to the distant future.

subtitles.original: 忘れられない あの日の後悔を
subtitles.english: The unforgettable regrets of that day...

subtitles.original: 追いかけて 追いかけて 滑り込んだ この想い
subtitles.english: ...chasing, chasing, I slid into this feeling.

subtitles.original: 青いソラに ふと溢れてった
subtitles.english: Suddenly overflowing into the blue sky.

subtitles.original: 遠く 遠く
subtitles.english: Far away, far away.

subtitles.original: 終わらない 終わらない
subtitles.english: It doesn't end, it doesn't end.

subtitles.original: 仕事が山積み終わらない
subtitles.english: The pile of work doesn't end.

subtitles.original: 止まらない 止まらない
subtitles.english: It doesn't stop, it doesn't stop.

subtitles.original: それでも時間は止まらない
subtitles.english: Even so, time doesn't stop.

subtitles.original: ヘトヘト 溜まり溜まったヘイト
subtitles.english: Exhausted, piled up hate.

subtitles.original: 全伐 誓いズバット コンボ 名手に金属バット
subtitles.english: Vowing total punishment, Zubat combo, a metal bat to the expert.

subtitles.original: 仕事手一杯 今日も手一杯
subtitles.english: My hands are full with work, hands full again today.

subtitles.original: No more 無知
subtitles.english: No more ignorance.

subtitles.original: Gimme Gimme 重視
subtitles.english: Gimme Gimme priority.

subtitles.original: I see
subtitles.english: I see.

subtitles.original: 奔走 Anytime 奔走 Anytime
subtitles.english: Running around anytime, running around anytime.

subtitles.original: 羽目外れそうで MPすっからかん
subtitles.english: About to lose control, my MP is empty.

subtitles.original: 自分自身に厳しすぎちゃう
subtitles.english: I'm too strict with myself.

subtitles.original: すぐさまヘラヘラ優等生
subtitles.english: Immediately becoming a grinning honor student.

subtitles.original: さっぱり足りない柔軟性
subtitles.english: Completely lacking flexibility.

subtitles.original: 自分自身としっかり向き合う
subtitles.english: Facing myself properly.

subtitles.original: 一番必要なものは
subtitles.english: The most important thing is...

subtitles.original: トレビアン
subtitles.english: Très Bien.

subtitles.original: ご褒美ちょうだい
subtitles.english: Give me a reward.

subtitles.original: 天手古舞うようなリズムにバイバイしちゃえ
subtitles.english: Say bye-bye to this chaotic rhythm.

subtitles.original: ドレミファの音に Go Round
subtitles.english: Go Round on the Do-Re-Mi-Fa notes.

subtitles.original: ぎゅうぎゅう詰め込んだメロディ どんどんフリーダム
subtitles.english: Crammed melody, rapidly freedom.

subtitles.original: 好きなもの食べ放題
subtitles.english: All-you-can-eat of what I like.

subtitles.original: オキシトシン増す脳内
subtitles.english: Oxytocin increasing in my brain.

subtitles.original: ほらもっともっとちょうだい
subtitles.english: Come on, give me more and more.

subtitles.original: 膨大
subtitles.english: Enormous.

subtitles.original: Get Ready
subtitles.english: Get Ready.

subtitles.original: サボです たまに空振り
subtitles.english: It's skipping, sometimes swinging and missing.

subtitles.original: ミスした日こそ胸張り大盛り
subtitles.english: On days I miss, I stick out my chest, large serving.

subtitles.original: 要らない まやかしの甘やかし
subtitles.english: I don't need fake pampering.

subtitles.original: ハッピーになるため歌おう 高らかに
subtitles.english: Let's sing loudly to become happy.

subtitles.original: 自分自身がやっぱり一番
subtitles.english: Myself is number one after all.

subtitles.original: 理性と欲望が平行線
subtitles.english: Reason and desire are parallel lines.

subtitles.original: 望みは幸せエンドレス
subtitles.english: My wish is endless happiness.

subtitles.original: 自分自身としっかり付き合う
subtitles.english: Properly getting along with myself.

subtitles.original: 我慢は体に毒だよ
subtitles.english: Endurance is poison for the body.

subtitles.original: トレビアン
subtitles.english: Très Bien.

subtitles.original: ご褒美ちょうだい
subtitles.english: Give me a reward.

subtitles.original: 天手古舞うようなリズムにバイバイしちゃえ
subtitles.english: Say bye-bye to this chaotic rhythm.

subtitles.original: ドレミファの音に Go Round
subtitles.english: Go Round on the Do-Re-Mi-Fa notes.

subtitles.original: ぎゅうぎゅう詰め込んだメロディ どんどんフリーダム
subtitles.english: Crammed melody, rapidly freedom.

subtitles.original: 1, 2の3 はい
subtitles.english: One, two, three, yes!

subtitles.original: 窮屈な鬱屈に 疲弊ヤストレス
subtitles.english: Cramped gloom, exhaustion and stress.

subtitles.original: 状態異常警報から解放
subtitles.english: Release from the status abnormality alarm.
